summary: 增加ARMS Prometheus监控的聚合实例，获取聚合实例列表。

Data.description: 聚合实例列表，为JSON格式字符串。
Data.example: [   {groupName: "聚合实例名称", clusterId: "global-v2-clusterid", endpoint: "cn-hangzhou"}, //   ..... more items ]

RequestId.description: 请求ID，用于定位日志，排查问题。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "Data": "[   {groupName: \"聚合实例名称\", clusterId: \"global-v2-clusterid\", endpoint: \"cn-hangzhou\"}, //   ..... more items ]",
  "RequestId": "DBDCE95A-A0DD-5FC5-97CC-EEFC3D814385",
  "Code": 200,
  "Message": "success"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListPrometheusGlobalViewResponse>
    <Data>[   {groupName: "聚合实例名称", clusterId: "global-v2-clusterid", endpoint: "cn-hangzhou"}, //   ..... more items ]</Data>
    <RequestId>DBDCE95A-A0DD-5FC5-97CC-EEFC3D814385</RequestId>
</ListPrometheusGlobalViewResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取聚合实例列表
